import product from "../components/Product"; import data from "../data"; import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; function ProductScreen(){ //x is a data retrived and to get the user click id using props.match.params.id for version 5 return(
back to Result

  • Status

) } export default ProductScreen
